mapper.select: select rt.staff_id, rt.task_standard_rel_id, rt.device_code, rt.station_code from repair_task_device_rel rt where rt.staff_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(rt.submit_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and rt.is_submit = 1
select cs.station_name from cs_station cs where cs.station_code = #{stationCode} and cs.del_flag = 0
